string.text: So, I'm here, at Dead City. I need to find the Mercs den, show my pass to the guard and grab the package - and try not to stay there for long.
That's quite a place the Mercs got here! Looks like the building is a former school... but whatever. Now I should find the local boss, take the package and get the hell out of this place.

Not only the assholes knocked me out but also robbed me blind... however, all of them are in a better place now. As for me, I need to find something they put my stuff into - probably some box or a bag.
